trans-unit.source: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个由可移动条组成的控件，该可移动条将容器的显示区域分成两个大小可调的面板。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> controls to existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panels to create many resizable display areas.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将控件添加到两个大小可调的面板中，并且你可以添加其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控件添加到现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>以创建多个可调整大小的面板显示区域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control to divide the display area of a container (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>将容器的显示区域的控件 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>)，并允许用户调整大小添加到控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>面板。

trans-unit.source: When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针移过拆分器，光标会改变，则指示内的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>可以调整控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 以前版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]仅支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> also eases control placement at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> 在设计时，还简化了控件放置。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器窗口，添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控制转移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性`DockStyle.Fill`。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill`.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制转移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性`DockStyle.Fill`。

trans-unit.source: To complete the layout, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> occupy the remaining space on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成布局，添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性`DockStyle.Fill`能够<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>上占用剩余的空间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，用户可以然后调整大小的两个使用拆分器控件的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or other container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>属性指定与应不调整控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或其他容器。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> to specify where the splitter starts on your form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>指定其中拆分器将启动窗体上。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>指定像素数拆分器移动一次。

trans-unit.source: The default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>为一个像素。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panel.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>来指定如何关闭的拆分栏可以移到外缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>面板。

trans-unit.source: The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 面板的默认最小大小为 25 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property to specify horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>属性指定水平方向。

trans-unit.source: The default orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> is vertical.
trans-unit.target: 默认方向<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>为垂直。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A> property to specify the border style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A>属性指定的边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>并协调其边框样式与你将添加到的控件的边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows both a vertical and horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的垂直和水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments.
trans-unit.target: 垂直拆分器以 10 像素的增量移动。

trans-unit.source: The left panel of the vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, and its right panel contains a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的左的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件，并且其右面板包含水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Both panels of the horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> are filled with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls, and the top panel is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> so that it does not resize when you resize the container.
trans-unit.target: 这两个水平的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>将填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件和顶部面板指<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>，以便它不调整大小，当您调整容器。

trans-unit.source: Moving the vertical splitter raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style.
trans-unit.target: 移动垂直拆分器将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving>事件，表示在此示例中的游标样式发生更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved>时停止移动拆分器将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是由还原为默认的游标样式表示在此示例中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value indicating whether scroll bars automatically appear if controls are placed outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> client area.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取或设置一个值，该值指示当控件放置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 工作区之外时，是否自动显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if scroll bars to automatically appear when controls are placed outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> client area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件放置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 工作区之外时自动显示滚动条，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自动滚动边距的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 值，它表示自动滚动边距的高度和宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: 自动滚动边距是任何子控件和可滚动父控件的边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A> size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A>大小添加到要确定是否需要滚动条的可滚动控件中包含任何子控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A>属性时调整父可滚动控件的或各个子控件放入视图中，计算和用于确定是否必须显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 停靠的控件被不确定是否必须显示滚动条的计算。

trans-unit.source: If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果到父可滚动控件的子控件的边缘的距离小于赋予的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A>属性设置为`true`，显示相应的滚动条。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>属性来管理分配给自动滚动条的屏幕大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的大小以完整显示其内容。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> is automatically resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动调整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes.
trans-unit.target: 控件的内容可能会更改原因有很多;包括显示数据更改;添加子控件;布局和空白区更改;或系统字体、 语言或解决方法更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>将自动调整大小以覆盖其内容，尽管它将永远不会被重新调整为小于其原始<xref:System.Drawing.Size>。

trans-unit.source: This operation will maintain the control’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将保持该控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />，表示在控件背景中显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> property to place a graphic image onto a control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>属性将放到控件上的图形图像。

trans-unit.source: Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用透明或透明的颜色的图像是 Windows 窗体控件的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported on child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> named `SplitContainer1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>名为`SplitContainer1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件创建控件集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 分配给控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.DefaultSize%2A> property in a derived class to specify a default size for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.DefaultSize%2A>以指定的默认大小为派生类中属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the size in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是比在中设置大小更高效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> borders are attached to the edges of the container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置附加到容器边缘的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 边框。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: You can dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to any edge of its container, or you can dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to all edges of the container so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> entirely fills the container.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将停靠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>可以停靠到其容器，或你的任何边缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>到容器的所有边缘以便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>完全填充容器。

trans-unit.source: For example, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left?displayProperty=nameWithType> to attach the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the left edge of its container.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left?displayProperty=nameWithType>要附加的左边的缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>到其容器的左边缘。

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in z-order.
trans-unit.target: 控件停靠在 z 顺序。

trans-unit.source: The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Z 顺序对应于的深度维度的屏幕，而 x 顺序和 y 顺序对应于水平和垂直维度中，分别。

trans-unit.source: Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Z 顺序定义的对象的前面，显示在控件或 windows 可以重叠或占用相同的空间，在屏幕上的情况下。

trans-unit.source: A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控件或窗口顶部的 z 顺序出现在所有其他控件或 windows 顶部且由 0 中的索引引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控件或窗口底部的 z 顺序的所有其他控件或窗口下方会显示且由的索引引用`(Controls.Count-1)`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 锚定和停靠的控件有关的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 用 Windows 窗体创建 Multipane 用户界面](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Dock%2A> property is set to `Fill`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个垂直拆分器其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Dock%2A>属性设置为`Fill`。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: Signals the object that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 用信号通知对象初始化已完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> panel remains the same size when the container is resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在调整容器大小时将大小保持不变的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 面板。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel" /> 的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panel stays the same size when a user resizes the container.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>面板在用户调整大小时容器时仍保持相同的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a horizontal splitter whose top panel is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> so that it does not resize along with the container.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示其顶部面板定义为一个水平拆分器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>，以便它不会随容器一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a horizontal splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了水平拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the splitter is fixed or movable.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示拆分器是固定的还是可移动的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the splitter is fixed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果拆分器是固定的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A> property to enable or disable splitter movement.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A>属性来启用或禁用拆分器移动。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might programmatically set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A> to `true` when refreshing the display, when some other control has the focus, or when an event is occurring for which the display areas divided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> must remain constant, and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A> to `false` when those circumstances do not apply.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以以编程方式将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A>到`true`当一些其他控件具有焦点时进行刷新显示，或者事件时就发生的显示区域除以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>必须保持不变，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A>到`false`不适用于这些情况下时。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnGotFocus%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnGotFocus%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A> event handler allows the user to move the splitter down when the DOWN arrow key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>事件处理程序允许用户向下何时按向下箭头键移动拆分器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A> event handler also draws the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>事件处理程序还绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>以移动时显示的拆分器的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A> event handler allows the user to track the splitter position while it is moved down with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>事件处理程序允许用户使用鼠标，向下移动时跟踪的拆分位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A> also draws the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A> 此外将绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>以移动时显示的拆分器的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> keeps track of the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> in case the user cancels the move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>将跟踪的初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>以防用户取消移动。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove" /> event.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> event handler allows the user to track the splitter position while it is moved with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A>事件处理程序允许用户使用鼠标移动时跟踪的拆分位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> also draws the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> keeps track of the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> in case the user cancels the move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>将跟踪的初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>以防用户取消移动。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> panels.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 面板处于水平方向还是垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from vertical to horizontal or from horizontal to vertical.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>属性可以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>从垂直到水平或垂直到水平。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a horizontal splitter whose top and bottom panels contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个水平拆分器的顶部和底部面板包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a horizontal splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了水平拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interior spacing, in pixels, between the edges of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的边缘与其内容之间的内部间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the interior spacing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 类型的一个对象，它表示内部间距。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets the left or top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, depending on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左侧面板或上部面板（根据 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 而定）。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Vertical" />, the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 为 <see langword="Vertical" />，则获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左侧面板。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Horizontal" />, the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 为 <see langword="Horizontal" />，则获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的上部面板。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> property to configure the left panel of a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> or the top panel of a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>属性配置垂直的左的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>或水平的顶部面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel1` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以通过更改的值指定面板的最小大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>属性，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>属性`Panel1`以便容器的大小调整，或可以获取或设置面板的时，该面板保持相同的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>包含任何可以接收焦点时，焦点将保留在单击时其拆分器上的控件。

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>为 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>为 1。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>包含任何可以接收焦点时，焦点将保留在单击时其拆分器上的控件。

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>为 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>为 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> 是折叠的还是展开的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果折叠了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> 的左边缘或上边缘的最小距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，它表示拆分器离 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> 的左边缘或上边缘的最小距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25 pixels, regardless of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 不管 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 为何值，默认值均为 25 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>属性以防止拆分器移动太靠近容器的向左或顶部边缘。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> from being covered.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要阻止的显示区域的某些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>被遮盖。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Vertical` (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>属性是`Vertical`（默认值）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>从左边缘以像素为单位的拆分器返回的最小距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>属性是`Horizontal`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>从上边缘，以像素为单位的拆分器返回的最小距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> (the left panel) is set to 30 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the left edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个垂直拆分器其中的最小大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>（左的面板） 设置为 30 个像素，但现在却拆分器可以从容器的左边缘的最小距离。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值与方向不一致。

trans-unit.source: Gets the right or bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, depending on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的右侧面板或下部面板（根据 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 而定）。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Vertical" />, the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 为 <see langword="Vertical" />，则获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的右侧面板。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Horizontal" />, the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 为 <see langword="Horizontal" />，则获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的下部面板。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> property to configure the right panel of a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> or the bottom panel of a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>属性配置垂直的右面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>或水平的底部面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel2` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以通过更改的值指定面板的最小大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>属性，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>属性`Panel2`以便容器的大小调整，或可以获取或设置面板的时，该面板保持相同的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>包含任何可以接收焦点时，焦点将保留在单击时其拆分器上的控件。

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>为 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>为 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> 是折叠的还是展开的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果折叠了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the right or bottom edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器离 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> 的右边缘或下边缘的最小距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the right or bottom edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，它表示拆分器离 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> 的右边缘或下边缘的最小距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25 pixels, regardless of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 不管 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 为何值，默认值均为 25 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the right or bottom edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>属性以防止拆分器移动太靠近容器的右侧或底部边缘。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> from being covered.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要阻止的显示区域的某些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>被遮盖。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Vertical` (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels that the splitter can be from the right edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>属性是`Vertical`（默认值）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>以拆分器可以来自的右边缘的像素为单位返回的最小距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels that the splitter can be from the bottom edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>属性是`Horizontal`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>以拆分器可以从下边缘的像素为单位返回的最小距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> (the right panel) is set to 20 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the right edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个垂直拆分器其中的最小大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>（右面板） 设置为 20 像素，但现在却拆分器可以从容器的右边缘的最小距离。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值与方向不一致。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一，表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键已由控件处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW.
trans-unit.target: 在消息预处理以处理对话框的按键字符，如选项卡、 向左箭头、 向右键、 向上键和向下箭头过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled.
trans-unit.target: 不处理包含 ALT 或控件修饰符的键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法指示控件未在处理该键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>只需将字符发送到父级的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType>类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件时，运行的时将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />派生类中的方法，控件应返回<see langword="true" />以指示它已处理该键。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 不会处理由控件调用基类的结果的密钥<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法应返回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控件将很少，如果有，需要重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cycle forward through the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" /> 内的控件中向前循环，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Selects the next available control and makes it the active control.
trans-unit.target: 选择下一个可用控件并使其成为活动控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了一个控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> controls the tab focus order in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> 按以下方式控制的选项卡焦点顺序：

trans-unit.source: From the first control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the first control on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 从外部的第一个控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>到上的第一个控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 上的所有控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The splitter (so that the user can use the arrow keys to move the splitter).
trans-unit.target: 拆分器 （以便用户可以使用箭头键移动拆分器）。

trans-unit.source: All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 上的所有控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The second control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> that is next in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 第二个控件外部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>即的 tab 键顺序的下一步。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 控件高度和宽度的缩放因子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值，指定在定义控件的大小和位置时要使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Scales the location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 缩放位置、大小、填充和边距。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定要选择的控件的方向，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" /> 则在 Tab 键顺序中前移；如果为 <see langword="false" /> 则在 Tab 键顺序中后移。

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 激活子控件。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: 还可以指定从中选择控件的 Tab 键顺序的方向。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 执行设置该控件的指定边界的工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器离 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左边缘或上边缘的位置（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，它表示拆分器离 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左边缘或上边缘的位置（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 50 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property to determine or specify the distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>属性可确定或指定以像素为单位的拆分器与容器的向左或顶部边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: You can both specify an initial distance and change the distance at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以同时指定初始距离和更改的距离在设计时或运行时间。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> is calculated in pixels from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>是`Horizontal`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>以从上边缘的像素为单位计算<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Vertical`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> is calculated in pixels from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>是`Vertical`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>计算以像素为单位，距左边缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies that the initial distance of the vertical splitter from the left edge of the container is 79 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例指定从容器的左边缘垂直拆分器的初始距离为 79 像素。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值小于零。

trans-unit.source: The value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该值与方向不一致。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the increment of splitter movement in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示拆分器移动的增量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the increment of splitter movement in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，它表示拆分器移动的增量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> property to create a snapping splitter that moves in larger increments than one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>要创建大于一个像素的较大增量移动对齐拆分器属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies that the vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例指定垂直拆分器移动在 10 个像素的增量。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 值小于 1。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.
trans-unit.target: 当移动拆分器控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style when you move the splitter.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving>事件，当移动拆分器的游标样式更改由表示在此示例中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved>时停止移动拆分器将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是由还原为默认的游标样式表示在此示例中。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is in the process of moving.
trans-unit.target: 当拆分器控件正处在移动过程中发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the user moves the splitter control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当用户移动拆分器控件时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It does not occur when you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 它不会发生更改时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>属性值以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style when you move the splitter.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving>事件，当移动拆分器的游标样式更改由表示在此示例中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved>时停止移动拆分器将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是由还原为默认的游标样式表示在此示例中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the splitter relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取拆分器相对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the size and location of the splitter relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，它指定拆分器相对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to get the width and height of the splitter relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>若要获取的宽度和高度的拆分器相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> event handlers draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A>事件处理程序绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>以移动时显示的拆分器的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> values vary depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 含义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>值会不同，具体取决于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The output of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> is in the format `{X, Y, Width, Height}`.
trans-unit.target: 输出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>采用以下格式`{X, Y, Width, Height}`。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> values for vertical and horizontal splitters.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的含义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>垂直和水平拆分条的值。

trans-unit.source: Dimension
trans-unit.target: 维度

trans-unit.source: Vertical Splitter
trans-unit.target: 垂直拆分器

trans-unit.source: Horizontal Splitter
trans-unit.target: 水平拆分器

trans-unit.source: X
trans-unit.target: X

trans-unit.source: The distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的拆分器从左边缘的距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: This value is always 0 for a horizontal splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此值始终为 0，该值指示拆分器与的左边缘对齐水平拆分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Y
trans-unit.target: Y

trans-unit.source: This value is always 0 for a vertical splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此值始终为 0 表示垂直拆分器，该值指示拆分器与的上边缘齐平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的拆分器从上边缘的距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Width
trans-unit.target: 宽度

trans-unit.source: The width of the splitter.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器，它相当于的高度高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控件。

trans-unit.source: Height
trans-unit.target: 高度

trans-unit.source: The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器，它相当于的高度高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控件。

trans-unit.source: The width of the splitter.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the splitter in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the width of the splitter, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，它表示拆分器的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is four pixels.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为四个像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterWidth%2A> property to change the width of the splitter itself, not the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterWidth%2A>属性可以不更改拆分器本身，宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies that the initial width of the vertical splitter is 6 pixels (the default).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例指定垂直拆分器的初始宽度为 6 个像素 （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>类。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one or is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该值小于 1 或与方向不一致。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点置于该拆分器上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点置于该拆分器上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为窗体的 tab 键顺序的下一个控件。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A>到`true`以以便与箭头键以及鼠标时，才可以将它移到拆分器将输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A>到`false`排除拆分器以及任何中包含的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>从的控件的 tab 键顺序的集合。

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使控件能够通过使用 TAB 键获得焦点，创建继承自控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建名为的新属性`TabStop`，并重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置控件的操作的 tab 键顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 所有消息都发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法通过进行筛选后的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅`WindowProc`处平台 SDK 文档中的函数http://msdn.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: for inheriting classes to call unmanaged code or for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于继承类调用非托管的代码或直接调用方调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method to process any messages that they do not handle.
trans-unit.target: 继承控件应调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法来处理它们不处理任何消息。
